about_the_game: Have yourself a spooky Halloween with the Vertical Drop Heroes! This DLC adds completely new Halloween themed skins for the Heroes and monsters of the Vertical Drop Heroes world, a brand new Halloween themed soundtrack, brand new Halloween themed decorations sprinkled around every level, and a LOT of pumpkins!
detailed_description: Have yourself a spooky Halloween with the Vertical Drop Heroes!
